lead_paragraph: Flyhalf Pat Lambie, who has not played for South Africa since June, was named among four call-ups to the Springboks squad for their last two Rugby Championship matches, the South African Rugby Union said on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Rugby-Lambie Returns for South Africa After Concussion Layoff
headline.main: Rugby-Lambie Returns for South Africa After Concussion Layoff

snippet: Flyhalf Pat Lambie, who has not played for South Africa since June, was named among four call-ups to the Springboks squad for their last two Rugby Championship matches, the South African Rugby Union said on Wednesday....
